about_the_game:
Ultimate Panzer is an action roguelike in which you control one of several powerful tanks. Equipped with a huge arsenal of unique weapons, the player explores procedurally generated dungeons made up of hundreds of hand-crafted arenas battling challenging foes.

DEADLY ARSENAL

The player will discover many new weapons throughout his voyage, such as cannons, machineguns, lasers, rocket launchers, grenade launchers and much more. Each weapon type enables unique gameplay ideas.

ROBOT ALIENS

The main adversary in the game are the evil robot aliens that conquered Earth. The fearless tank commander must defeat them to save the planet.
